comments:
Loading a runtime workspace with CDT enabled, I get the error message "Error notifying a preference change listener. Check the log for details." On clicking OK  on this error message, it appears again. This leaves me unable to open my runtime workspace without disabling CDT.

All that I had done previously is add CDT to my PDE runtime plugin set, and create two new projects and create source files for them. I did not change any preferences. I then closed or killed this workspace (I can't remember which).

Here is the stack trace:
